experience.title: experience
experience.description:
I am a Fullstack Developer with a Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology and over 3 years of experience working in a Japanese enterprise environment.

Proficient in PHP Laravel and Vue/Nuxt, I have worked on projects ranging from small-scale applications to large-scale systems.

Experienced in building and deploying microservices architecture, implementing load balancing, and optimizing system performance.

Skilled in deploying projects to hosting services, VPS, and AWS, as well as maintaining and enhancing existing systems by adding new features.

I am committed to writing clean, maintainable code and delivering solutions that meet user needs effectively.

With a strong willingness to learn and a mindset that embraces challenges, I strive to grow both personally and professionally in every project I take on.
